explanation: [0-0] A man in a white shirt is sitting at the dining table, holding a cut watermelon placed on the table. The watermelon is in a red basin. On the table, there is also a white empty plate and a white plate with five sausages. Behind the empty plate, there is a metal object. A woman in a black shirt is standing at the green kitchen counter with her back to the camera. There is a large TV on the wall and several switches.
